greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smaller member in a set of two distinct odd numbers the sum of whose reciprocals is 2/(2*n - 1), or 0 if no such integer exists.
comment: a(n) = 0 if and only if n = 1 or 2*n - 1 is in A002145.
program: (PARI) print1(0, ", "); forstep(n=3, 141, 2, f=2/n; y=0; if(!(isprime(n)&&Mod(n, 4)==3), y=2*floor((n+1)/4)+1; until(y==n, if(numerator(f-1/y)==1, break); y=y+2)); print1(y, ", "));
results.author: _Arkadiusz Wesolowski_, Mar 13 2014
